item.description: Read more about the work of @commonsproccom.parliament.uk which I chair. From proxy voting to the way in which select committee chairs get elected. We are busy reviewing the procedures of the House of Commons and, hopefully, recommending improvements! www.politicshome.com/opinion/arti… Source: Cat Smith MP (Bluesky)

item.title: Final chance to have your say on the future of local government in Lancashire
item.description: Residents, businesses and community groups in the Ribble Valley are invited to have a final say on the future of local government in Lancashire. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: West Ham boss Nuno Espirito Santo on Burnley clash, Alex Disasi debut and team news
item.description: Many have already written off Burnley in their fight for survival, but if they‚Äôre to give themselves any hope ‚Äì they simply must beat West Ham this weekend. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Ex-police officer jailed for coercing woman
item.description: Michael Harvey had already admitted “using police systems” to look up the complainant. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Public consultation available on new Clitheroe pump track funded by UKSPF
item.description: Members of the public are being encouraged to have their say on plans to create a pump track in Clitheroe. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: 'Fear of drugs': Anger at plans for 77 affordable homes in popular Ribble Valley village
item.description: Plans for more than 70 affordable homes in a popular Ribble Valley village have sparked dozens of objections, including fears of ‚Äòdrugs and anti-social behaviour‚Äô and a fall in local property values. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Lancashire paedophile Kenneth Booth, 66, jailed for abusing girls in Chorley and Longridge
item.description: A 66-year-old paedophile has been jailed for sexually abusing girls in Longridge and Chorley. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: This best-selling bread maker is 39 percent off on Amazon right now
item.description: Amazon has slashed the price of its top selling bread maker with nearly 40 percent knocked off for a limited time Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Raft of events including food festival, carnival, Proms in the Park and soapbox challenge announced by council
item.description: Hyndburn Council will support 23 events in 2026 promising activities for all the family spread across high streets and green spaces around the borough. Source: LEP Preston

item.description: With news that King Charles III is returning to Clitheroe next week, it‚Äôs the perfect time to look back at some of the highlights from his last visit to the Ribble Valley. Source: Burnley Express
